memberdef.name: buffer_type

detaileddescription.para:
Function initializes the Retarded and Keldysh components of the self-energy
Q
: Type of values (usually comp)
valR
: Value for the constant Retarded self-energy
valK
: Value for the constant Keldysh self-energy

memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, int iv, int i_in) const -> Q
memberdef.name: val

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the saved value of the self-energy
Q
: Type of values (usually comp)
iK
: Keldysh index (either 0 or 1)
iv
: Frequency index
i_in
: Internal structure index
The value of SigmaR/K at the chosen indices

memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, double v, int i_in) const -> Q
memberdef.name: valsmooth

detaileddescription.para:
Linear interpolating function returning the value of the Retarded or Keldysh self-energy at freq v
Q
: Type of values (usually comp)
iK
: Keldysh index (either 0 or 1)
v
: Frequency
i_in
: Internal index
: Interpolated value using the saved values as basis

memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, int iv, int i_in, Q val)
memberdef.name: setself

detaileddescription.para:
Sets the value of the self-energy to a specific value at the specified location

: Type of values (usually comp)
iK
: Keldysh index (either 0 or 1)
iv
: Frequency index
i_in
: Internal index
val
: Value of the self-energy at this given point

memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, int iv, int i_in, Q val)

memberdef.name: update_grid

briefdescription.para: Interpolate self-energy to updated grid whose grid parameters are multiples of Delta = (Lambda + Gamma)/2.

memberdef.references: dataBuffer< Q, k, rank, numberFrequencyDims, pos_first_freqpoint, frequencyGrid_type, inter, >::update_grid

briefdescription.para: Interpolate self-energy to input grid with Sigma given by selfEnergy4Sigma.
finds optimal grid parameters with minimizer()
Elementwise division (needed for error estimate of adaptive ODE solvers)

inbodydescription.para: TODO: dump state in file if certain thresholds are exceeded
